message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product, and I think it's worth every penny. I'm willing to start at a price of $14000. What do you think?
I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $12500 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
I understand you're looking to save some money, but I have to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $13250. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $12800 for the product. Can you consider this offer?

I understand you're trying to make one last compromise, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $13500 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
I'm not willing to go below $14000, but I'm willing to meet you at $13900. This is my final compromise, so I hope you can accept it.
